//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	use ( "a1_sarge" );
	use ( "a1_soldier_one" );
	use ( "a1_soldier_two" );
	use ( "alarm1" );

	affect ( "a1_sarge", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "HoldArea" );
		set ( "SET_AREAGOAL", "alarm_one_spot" );
	}

}
